name: Mammut Ophir 3 Slide Climbing Harness for Men – Adjustable, Lightweight, and Durable Gear for Rock, Gym, and Sport Climbing
short_description: Synthetik
Imported
Versatile Design: Ideal for rock climbing, ice climbing, sport climbing, and mountaineering.
Adjustable Fit: Equipped with adjustable leg loops and Slide Bloc buckles for a customizable fit.
High-Performance Construction: Features two-part webbing construction, abrasion protection harness, and synthetic tie-in loop for durability and comfort.
Multi-Use Gear: Perfect for multipitch climbing, gym climbing, and alpine climbing adventures.
Sustainable & Ethical: A bluesign product with Fair Wear garment certification for responsible manufacturing.
product_description: The Mammut Ophir 3 Slide Climbing Harness is the ultimate climbing companion designed for climbers who seek comfort, durability, and performance across all disciplines. Whether you’re scaling indoor walls, tackling outdoor sport climbing, or taking on mountaineering expeditions, the Ophir 3 Slide is engineered to meet the needs of every climber. With adjustable leg loops and Slide Bloc buckles, this breathable climbing harness provides a personalized, snug fit that ensures optimal freedom of movement. Built for toughness, the harness features two-part webbing construction for added strength and abrasion protection harness technology to withstand wear and tear from rugged climbs. It also includes four gear loops and a haul loop harness for convenient gear storage. Whether you’re taking on a challenging multipitch climb or enjoying a gym climbing Mammut session, the Ophir 3 Slide delivers the climbing protection gear you can trust. Sustainably produced and bluesign product certified, this harness meets the highest standards of ethical manufacturing. The Mammut Ophir 3 Slide Climbing Harness is an essential piece of technical climbing gear designed for climbers who value both performance and environmental responsibility.

name: KwikSafety Positioning Lanyard - 4' to 6' Adjustable, No Shock Absorber, ANSI/OSHA Rated for Tree Climbing, Roof Work, Safety Harnesses - Copperhead
short_description: Positioning Use Only – No Shock Absorber. Designed for restraint and positioning - not fall arrest. Made from durable 1.25" polyester webbing with reinforced stitching, this flat, single leg lanyard adjusts from 4' to 6'. Ideal for controlled movement and stable support at height when used with side D-ring harnesses or belts.

Heavy-Duty Snap Hooks & Hardware. Equipped with two ANSI-tested alloy steel snap hooks (minimum 5,000lb tensile strength) and a corrosion-resistant steel adjuster buckle. Quick to connect, easy to adjust, and reliable on the job site.

ANSI & OSHA Compliant. Meets ANSI Z359.12 standards and OSHA requirements when used correctly as part of a restraint or positioning system. Perfect for roofing, arborist tasks, tower work, inspections, and more, where stability is key but fall arrest is not needed.

Made for Demanding Jobs. Built to withstand rugged conditions across construction, climbing, tree care, utility work, and maintenance environments. Whether you’re in a harness hanging a stand or positioning on a roof, it delivers safe, stable, hands-free operation.

Safety Without Bulk. Offers a compact, lightweight alternative to bulky fall arrest gear when arrest protection isn’t required. Maintain freedom of movement and focus on the task at hand, without sacrificing compliance or control.

product_description: Product Description Fusion Climb Centaur Half Body Harness Black M-XL for Climbing Gym & Rope Course - In Greek mythology Centaurs were the embodiment of untamed nature and the teachers. - The Centaur is the ideal multi-purpose and rental harness since it is light, easy to adjust and super strong. - Light weight harness with reinforced belay loop. - 3 point adjustment. 2 piece adjuster buckles used in waist and legs. - Adjustment on the outer body allows for trainer to do adjustment of the wearer. - Ideal harness for indoor climbing gyms, ropes courses, and outdoor guides due to its 3 fast pass buckles for easy adjustment by instructor, reinforced tie-in point for extra durability. - Made from 5000lb test mil spec webbing and weighs under 3 lbs. - MBS: 23 KN - Size: M-XL From the Manufacturer The Centaur is the ideal mulit-purpose and rental harness since it is light, easy to adjust and super strong. Made from 5,000lb test mil-spec webbing with a reinforced tie-in point and stitching, this harness will last even under high use conditions like a climbing gym or rope course.

name: Wild Country Session Men’s Rock Climbing Harness - Adjustable Harness for Sport & Trad Climbing
product_description: The Wild Country Session Men’s Harness has the chops for any climb, whether in the gym or high in the alpine. It’s surprisingly supportive and well-ventilated with padded Dura-Weave mesh fabric. Wild Country improved the Slide buckles at the waist and leg loops for quick-and-easy adjustments accommodating alpine layers and summer cragging outfits. There are four large gear loops and an extra tool loop at the rear.

name: KAILAS B4 Rocking Climbing Harness Adjustable Roofing Harness Rescue Safety Harness Tree Climbing Harness Spikes
short_description: Polyester
Imported
CE & UIAA Certified: Meets international safety standards for rock climbing and mountaineering

Comfortable & Efficient: Padded wasitbelt and leg loops for maximum comfort. Ergonomic waist belt and leg loops for freedom of movement. Patented extra center loop allows easy attachment of chest ascenders and chest harness.

ADJUSTABLE & DURABLE: Quick Buckle on the waistbelt and leg loops offer a wide range of adjustment. Buckle on either side of the waist belt keeps the harness centered on your hips. High-strength belay loop keeps you secure.
FULLY EQUIPPED: 2 stiff front gear loops allow easy access to gear and 2 smooth rear gear loops avoid interference with your backpack. A slot on either side of the waist for a tool holder.
Specifications: XS-M—waist: 62-96cm, leg: 47-61cm, weight 476g; L-XXL—waist circumference: 83-110cm, leg circumference: 54-72cm, weight 544g;

100% Satisfaction Guarantee—We guarantee customers the best products & services. Up to 12 months after the purchase date, we are happy to provide either a refund or replacement in case of any climbing belt issues. Please contact us via Amazon, and include order number, a description of the problem, and images.
